Package com.arjuna.CosTransactions

Class Summary
Configuration Build-time configuration information for the module.
CosTransactionsNames  
Info Module specific implementation of the information object.
OTS This class is essentially here for convenience purposes, and until all ORBs provide a means to set their initial references for Current and the TransactionFactory.
OTS_AbstractRecord This abstract record is used whenever resources are derived from the ArjunaOTS module's AbstractRecord interface.
OTS_ActionHierarchy Maintains the OTS transaction hierarchy.
OTS_ActionHierarchyIterator An iterator for the OTS_ActionHierarchy.
OTS_ContextManager This class is responsible for managing the thread-to-transaction context mappings.
OTS_ContextPropagationManager Registers the appropriate filter with the ORB.
OTS_Control An implementation of CosTransactions::Control
OTS_ControlWrapper This class attempts to mask the local/remote control issue.
OTS_Current The implementation of CosTransactions::Current.
OTS_Defaults Some default values for the OTS.
OTS_Environment The various property values that may be specified at runtime to change the configuration and behaviour of the system.
OTS_Exceptions Various exception values that we use in the OTS in a number of situations, particularly if the ORB does not support some of the standard OTS SystemExceptions.
OTS_ExplicitInterposition This class is responsible for doing interposition in the case where implicit context propagation is not possible.
OTS_Factory An implementation of ArjunaOTS::ArjunaFactory.
OTS_RecoveryCreator This abstract class is used to allow dynamic registration of creators for RecoveryCoordinators.
OTS_ResourceRecord Arjuna abstract record to handle CORBA (SubtransactionAware)Resource interface.
OTS_Synchronization CosTransactions::Synchronizations are maintained in a separate list from the standard transaction intentions list.
OTS_Thread Create an OTS transactional thread.
OTS_Transaction OTS implementation class.
OTS_TransactionReaper Class to record transactions with non-zero timeout values, and class to implement a transaction reaper thread which terminates these transactions once their timeout elapses.
OTS_Utility Some useful utility functions for the OTS.
 

Error Summary
OTS_Error Error that may be thrown during transaction processing.
